text: Moshi kare-ra ga hanko shite saru no ga anata ni hidoku kutsunaraba, anata ni dekirunara,-chi ni ton'neru o hori, matawa ten ni hashigo o kakete, kare-ra ni shirushi o gen wase. Arra ga o konomi ni narunaraba,(tadashi) michibiki no ue ni kare-ra o atsume rareru. Sorede anata wa, muchinamono no nakama to natte wa naranai
